author: Patricia Kowsmann
title: Goldman’s Blankfein: Brexit Proving Less Drastic than Expected
text:
Chief Executive said Thursday that the effects of the U.K.’s exit from the European Union have been less pronounced than originally expected, although that may change years from now. “I would have thought that there would have been a worse outcome by now,” Mr. Blankfein said in a live streamed interview with Politico in Brussels. […]
